about_the_game:
Wanna fap in HD?


This pack contains all adult scenes of Agent Lovesdick in HD resolution, size 1920x1080 with backgrounds and WITHOUT backgrounds. You can use it to make your wallpapers and/or have fun looking at it without texts box. In other words, you'll get:

  • 10 adult scenes, some based on sexual fetishes (sex between humans and monsters, sex with tentacles, glory hole, pissing, and others) with poses variations OR;
  • 30 different poses (including the cumming ones) totalizing 10 scenes OR;
  • 56 sex poses (with and without background).

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Agent Lovesdick\Adult Art Pack

content_descriptors.notes: This pack contains uncensored sex scenes from Agent Lovesdick, some based on sexual fetishes (sex between humans and monsters, sex with tentacles, glory hole, pissing, and others.).
